ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
(b) 7. Other operating income …’
Answer
(1) How is total revenue of a credit institution defined?
Total revenue of a credit institution, according to ESRS 2 paragraph 40, is a proxy for ‘net turnover’
